item.title: Did the Big Ten Wear Themselves Out Too Much Prior To March Madness?
item.description: According to ESPN, 35% of fans picked the Gonzaga Bulldogs to take home the NCAA Menâ€™s Basketball Championship. 15.4% picked the Illinois Fighting Illini, 10.2% picked the actual winner-the Baylor Bears. The Michigan Wolverines were picked by 7.8% of the fans, the Hawkeyes from Iowa just 3.6%, and the Ohio State Buckeyes 3.5%. According to an Insider article, 53.1% of fans picked Illinois to make the Final Four, 39.
